targets.rawSql:
SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])

SELECT
  [Priority],
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,[DateEarliestEvidence],[DateCreated])) avgTTD,
	AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,[DateCreated],[DateClosed])) avgTTR,
  COUNT(*) as Count
 FROM 
	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])
GROUP BY
  [Priority]
ORDER BY
  [Priority] ASC

SELECT [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE $__timeFilter([Date Created])

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 1

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 0 AND cs.Name = 'Incident'

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 0

select * from
 
(
SELECT p.FullName as "Case Owner",count(c.Name) as CaseCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case
When CaseStatusID = 1 Then 'Created'
When CaseStatusID = 2 Then 'Completed'
When CaseStatusID = 3 Then 'Incident'
When CaseStatusID = 4 Then 'Mitigated'
When CaseStatusID = 5 Then 'Resolved' End)) as CaseStatusID
  FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] as c
  left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] as p on p.PersonID=c.PersonID
WHERE  $__timeFilter(c.DateCreated)
group by p.FullName,CaseStatusID
 
) d
pivot
(
sum(CaseCount)
for CaseStatusID in (Created,Completed,Incident,Mitigated,Resolved)
) piv

select Tag,count(ct.CaseID) as Count FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[CaseToTag] as ct

join  [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Tag] as t on ct.TagID=t.TagID

join [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] as c on c.caseID=ct.caseid

where c.DateCreated between getdate()-30 and getdate()

Group By Tag

SELECT [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE $__timeFilter([Date Created])

select a.*,b.[Avg Time to Detect] as 'avg TTD',b.[Avg Time to Respond] as 'avg TTR',b.[Avg Time to Qualify] as 'avg TTQ',b.[Avg Time to Investigate] as 'avg TTI',b.[Avg Time to Mitigate] as 'avg TTM',b.[Avg Time to Recover] as 'avg TTV' from
(select *, (isnull(Created,0)+isnull(Completed,0)+isnull(Incident,0)+isnull(Mitigated,0)+isnull(Resolved,0)) as 'Total Cases' from
(
SELECT p.FullName as "Case Owner",count(c.Name) as CaseCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case
When CaseStatusID = 1 Then 'Created'
When CaseStatusID = 2 Then 'Completed'
When CaseStatusID = 3 Then 'Incident'
When CaseStatusID = 4 Then 'Mitigated'
When CaseStatusID = 5 Then 'Resolved' End)) as CaseStatusID
  FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] as c
  left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] as p on p.PersonID=c.PersonID
  where  DateCreated between getdate()-30 and getdate() and p.PersonID is not null
group by p.FullName,CaseStatusID
) d
pivot
(
sum(CaseCount)
for CaseStatusID in (Created,Completed,Incident,Mitigated,Resolved)
) piv) as a
full outer join
(select p.FullName, avg(DATEDIFF(minute,DateEarliestEvidence,DateCreated)) as 'Avg Time to Detect',
avg(DATEDIFF(minute,DateCreated,DateMitigated)) as 'Avg Time to Respond',
avg(DATEDIFF(minute,DateEarliestEvidence,DateCreated)) as 'Avg Time to Qualify',
avg(DATEDIFF(minute,DateCreated,DateClosed)) as 'Avg Time to Investigate',
avg(DATEDIFF(minute,DateIncident,DateMitigated)) as 'Avg Time to Mitigate',
avg(DATEDIFF(minute,DateMitigated,DateResolved)) as 'Avg Time to Recover'
FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] as c
left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] as p on p.PersonID=c.PersonID
where  DateCreated between getdate()-30 and getdate() and p.PersonID is not null
group by FullName) as b on a.[Case Owner]=b.FullName

SELECT TOP 1000 [CaseNumber], [Case Name],  [Case Resolution] AS Resolution,  [Case Priority] AS Priority,  [Case Status] AS Status, (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  
(SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  
(SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  
(SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE $__timeFilter([Date Created]) 
ORDER BY
  [CaseNumber] DESC

SELECT  [CaseNumber],   [Case Name],  [Case Resolution] AS Resolution,  [Case Priority] AS Priority,  [Case Status] AS Status,  [Case Tags], [Owner], [Case Collaborators] AS Collaborator,  [Evidence Logs Count] AS Logs,  [Evidence Files Count] AS Files,  [Evidence Alarms Count] AS Alarms,  
[Evidence Notes Count] AS Notes FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE $__timeFilter([Date Created])
ORDER BY
  [CaseNumber] DESC
